trigger.Name: StartFadeEffect
trigger.script:
g_ObjCont:SetGameTime( 10, 0, 21, 5, 2023 ) SetRadarUpgrade(1) SetWeather(0)
Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
TActivate("StartFadeEffect_End") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("tunel_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 6, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
TActivate("TunelOpenGate") TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_End") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: TunelOpenGate
trigger.script: local g = GetEntityByName("tunel_gate") if g then g:SetNodeAction(AT_RESERVED4) end CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_OPEN_GATE", "sound_gate1", -1, -1, CVector(815, 259, 1054), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0) TActivate("TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd
trigger.script: local s = GetEntityByName("sound_gate1") if s then s:Remove() end CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_OPEN_GATE_END", "sound_gate2", -1, -1, CVector(815, 259, 1054), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_End
trigger.script:
local g = GetEntityByName("tunel_gate") if g then g:SetNodeAction(AT_STAND2) end
for i=1,2 do local s = GetEntityByName("sound_gate"..i) if s then s:Remove() end end
TDeactivate("TunelOpenGate") TDeactivate("TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd")
TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_Fade") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_Fade
trigger.script:
Fly("tunel_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_ENTERS", "fx", -1, -1, GetPlayerVehicle():GetPosition(), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_FadeEnd") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_FadeEnd
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local fx = GetEntityByName("fx") if fx then fx:Remove() end
PassToMap("r0m1", "FromR0M0", -1, 1) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutCredits
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
SetWeather(0) SetGameTime(20,0)
PlayCustomMusic("Credits01")
CreateHuman("Human_player_slow", 1100, CVector(1045.535, 255.641, 1525.996), "HumanPlayer")
local hum = GetEntityByName("HumanPlayer") local humID = hum:GetId()
Fly("credits_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 21.9, 1, 0) FlyLinked("credits_cam_keqing01", humID, 40.57, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player01_1", humID, 0.64, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player01_2", humID, 0.57, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player01_3", humID, 0.58, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player02", humID, 29.94, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player02_1", humID, 0.74, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player02_2", humID, 0.6, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_keqing02_3", humID, 1.25, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_keqing02_4", humID, 1.6, 0, 0, nil) FlyLinked("credits_cam_player02", humID, 5.1, 0, 0, nil) Fly("credits_cam03", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 4.45, 0, 0) Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 2, 0, 1) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(1, 0)
TActivate("cutCreditsFadeIn") TActivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer01") TActivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer02") TActivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer02_") TActivate("cutCreditsCam_start_game") TActivate("cutCreditsEnd")
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetThrottle(0) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) end
local hum = GetEntityByName("HumanPlayer") if hum then hum:SetWalkPathByName("player_cut_path") end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutCreditsFadeIn
trigger.script: local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(893.077, 255.493, 987.899)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.009, -0.005, -0.000, 1.000)) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutCreditsEnd
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local hum = GetEntityByName("HumanPlayer") if hum then hum:Remove() end
TDeactivate("cutCreditsFadeIn") TDeactivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer01") TDeactivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer02") TDeactivate("cutCreditsCamPlayer02_") TDeactivate("cutCreditsCam_start_game")
TActivate("CloseGate1ForCredits")
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
SetVar("WatchCredits", 1)
TActivate("MessageEndGame")
trigger:Deactivate()
